statements: SELECT customer_name, purchase_history FROM personalized_emails WHERE customer_id = 1;

SELECT * FROM personalized_emails WHERE purchase_history LIKE '%shoes%';

SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM personalized_emails ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT template_name, subject_line FROM email_templates WHERE template_id = 3;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_history FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT template_name, email_body FROM email_templates WHERE subject_line LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY template_id ASC;

SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT purchase_id, product_name, purchase_amount FROM purchases;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT product_name, purchase_amount FROM purchases JOIN products ON purchases.product_name = products.product_name WHERE purchase_amount > 100;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id JOIN products ON purchases.product_name = products.product_name ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;

SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE product_id = 3;

SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;

SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;

SELECT customer_name, email_sent_date, interaction_type FROM customers INNER JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE interaction_type = 'Email';
